name: MypicturE Nursery Rhymes Vol1
description: Have your child STAR in their personalized nursery rhyme collection! NO ADS!  MypicturE Nursery Rhymes Vol1 app enhances toddlers learning by placing them at the center of nursery rhymes songs. It is an interactive app that enables you to personalize top kids songs by adding your childs face to nursery rhymes videos. Snap or upload a photo, fill the outline with your childs face and choose a hair color for your child to become a STAR of a nursery rhyme collection. Imagine your childs excitement and surprise when being featured in a nursery rhyme song video.   This is an offline kids nursery rhymes app. A Road trip, waiting room or a flight? Your child can be a STAR of a personal nursery rhyme at any place and at any time without needing access to the internet.  Have your child experience being a STAR in the top nursery rhymes: - Row, Row, Row Your Boat - Old MacDonald Had a Farm - Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star - Bingo - Sing a Song of Sixpence - The Alphabet Song - Ring Around the Rosie  Cost for a package of 7 songs is $1.99  Let your childs nursery rhyme song journey begin!  Volume 2 coming soon!  We are always grateful for any feedback. We can be contacted at contact@mypicture.app  Thank you. MypicturE
